price: Na akawasomea, wasingeli kuwa wenye kuamini.
arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Na angeli wasomea baraabara kinyume na ada bado wangeli mkanusha, na wakapatia kisababu kwa ukafiri wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faqara-ahu ʿalayhim mā kānū bihi mu'minīna
